sentences.english: The expenses on advertising and sales promotion will be shared between our two parties.
sentences.chinese: 廣告和促銷的費用由我們雙方均攤。

sentences.english: The cost for the trip was halved by us.
sentences.chinese: 我們均攤了那次旅遊的費用。

sentences.english: He and I decided to have the expenses on our trip.
sentences.chinese: 我和他決定均攤旅行費用。

sentences.english: It's hard to share the cost of cars.
He and I decided to halve expenses on our trip.
sentences.chinese: 我和他決定均攤旅行費用。
